|brand = MYIR |model = Rico Board |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = MYS-4378-10 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = development board, single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;AM4378;AM4378BZDND100 |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128JVEQ; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Micron;MTFC4GACAJCN-1M WT; |flash2size = 4 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K128M16JT-125; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Microchip;KSZ9031RN; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |lan2_ports = <!-- 4, --> |lan2_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |totlan = <!-- total lan ports --> |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 04:79:B7
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2013.10;; |stockos = Linux;3.12.10;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG), Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes, 6-pin header, populated, 3.3V TTL, (115200 8N1), J2 |jtag = yes, 20-pad header, unpopulated, J8
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI, RGB LCD FPC, MIPI CPI, Micro SD Card slot, I2C, SPI, CAN, UART, GPIO, |addchip = HDMI Transmitter;Lattice Semiconductor;Sil9022A;;1;,,, HDMI Companion Chip w/I2C Level Shifting Buffer;TI;TPD12S016;;1;,,, Single Chip PMIC;Texas Instruments;TPS65218;;1;,,, 500mA Bypass Capacitor CMOS LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9013;;2;,,, Single Buffer/Driver w/Open-Drain Output;TI;SN74LVC1G07;;2;,,, Sink/Source DDR Termination Regulator;TI;TPS51200;;1;,,, 6V, 10A Rail Clamp Array;Littelfuse Inc;SP3050;;2;,,, 256Kb I2C Serial EEPROM;ON Semi;CAT24C256;;1;,,, Single 2-Input Positive AND Gate;TI;SN74LVC1G08;;1;,,, P-Channel 2.5V Specified MOSFET;ON Semi;FDT434P;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = "none" |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2015 |estprice = 99 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|List of SBCs|}}
===Specification=== *CPU: ''[[TI]]'' Sitara AM4378 @1.0GHz ARM (Cortex-A9) :4x PRU 32-bit Microcontrollers @200MHz *GPU: PowerVR SGX530 *Storage: 16MB (QSPI) Flash, :4GB eMMC, Micro SD (TF) slot *Memory: 512MB (DDR3) RAM *USB: 1x USB 2.0, 1x USB 2.0 (OTG) ports *Power: 5V/2A
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/03/03/myir-tech-announces-low-cost-rico-and-z-turn-boards-powered-by-ti-am437x-and-xilinx-zynq-7010-socs/ ''MYiR Tech Announces Low Cost Rico'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/io-rich-sbc-runs-linux-on-cortex-a9-sitara-soc/ ''I/O-rich SBC runs Linux on Cortex-A9 Sitara SoC'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> File:RicoBoard Top.jpeg|Board Top File:RicoBoard bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
==See also== :;[http://www.myirtech.com/product.asp?lx=big&anid=83 Single Board Computers] *[[MYIR MYS-6ULX-IOT]] *[[MYIR Rico Board]] *[[MYIR Z-turn Board]] *[[MYIR Z-turn Lite (Z7010)]]
